adHeader: Looking for a Dj? House Parties,Halls, Kick Backs & More
adDetails: Hey there if your looking for a fun, moving party then I'm your guy! I charge $65 dollars per hour with no extra charge surprises!! All of our equipment is professional, our service will include: Music, Lighting, Fog, and Wireless Microphone. We specialize in banda,norte?o,zapateado,corridos,cumbia,merengue,salsa,reggaeton,bachata rap, hip-hop, oldies and much more. We will be more then happy to play your own special list as well!! We are Serious & Responsible people, we commit 100% to what we promise and make sure your event is a success. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to ask us.
